name: Alcatramath
description:
Alcatramath is an educational game where you have to escape from a prision full of trap-rooms. To cross this rooms you have to solve their puzzles using maths. 

This game was developed with Adobe Flash, programmed with Actionscript and designed with Adobe Illustrator.  It was my degree final project (2008) and it was used to teach maths at a high school.

Its in Spanish and currently have some typografic problems but you can test all puzzles pressing "Indice" button.
